About

Blog Logo

Junsik Whang

After spending 2 months learning this and that, I've finally settled down with Jekyll. My python-addicted friends wouldn't like it, but I guess this is enough for me, for now.

I am a young data analyst working in a small consultancy in South Korea(Not in Devon!). I love handling various kinds of data (especially text and tag data) and often get thrilled by what that data says.

To do some more interesting stuff, I'm trying to get my head around Python(data crawling), R(data analysis) and d3.js(data visualisation). There must be tonnes of things I need to shove into my tiny brain (yet big head), but let's see how my journey goes...
